label: attachedIOTDevice
comment: An IOT device attached to this logistics transport means.
An IOT device attached to this piece of logistics transport equipment.

rangeIncludes.comment: An object or system made or adapted for an IOT (Internet of Things) purpose such as to collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data especially when connected to a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment.

domainIncludes.comment: The device or method used to convey people, goods, animals or other objects from place to place.
